snippet.title: No Energy, No Diamonds, No Problem | Valefor
snippet.description:
Hey there Legends!

Are you tired of games that force you to have the reflexes of a ninja or the freetime of a kid on summer break?

Well fasten those seatbelts, because Valefor is here to change your gaming landscape! 

Imagine a game that delivers on enough strategy that it could keep a Grandmaster busy- all while remaining chill enough for even the most casual of players.

And we don't do that Free-To-Play but Pay-To-Win nonsense here.  That means:

No Energy!
No Diamonds!
No Annoying Timers!
-And last but not least, absolutely No Paywalls!

Take your battle hardened team and conquer your enemies in both an expansive PVE campaign filled with rogue-lite dungeony goodness, or dominate the arena in our strategic PVP battlefields! 

Do you like randomized perks? We got em. Loot? We have treasure chests galore. A story to immerse you in a world of dark fantasy? We've got you covered in spades.

Every time you complete a dungeon, you unlock new zones to expand your kingdom. Raise different buildings to get unique upgrades.

And don't you worry, the good times don't stop at gameplay! Valefor offers sleek visuals, and epic music. Jam out to awesome tracks all while kitting your units out in the game's many cosmetic skins.

No matter what you're after, Valefor is what you're waiting for.  Join the battle today! Adventure awaits!
